reviewText:
I have used the VHS version of this very pivitol time in my life
as a teacher in High School for a few years.  The only problem that
I had with the presentation as a whole was the constant use of the
words, brave and courageous few.  We all had jobs and mine was in
the hole.  Only the skinny kind were used as they were the only ones
that fit.  And the only concern was our safety, as someone else
would have to go down.
